title: Introduction to Physics I
description: Elementary mechanics. Vectors, Newton's laws, inverse square force laws, work and energy, conservation of momentum and energy, and oscillations.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): MATH 19A or MATH 20A; concurrent enrollment in PHYS 5L is required.

class_notes: Enroll in lecture and associated discussion sectionEnroll in lecture and associated secondary lab
